pr_title: KEYCLOAK-11683 Reduce unnecessary load on work cache

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-11683 Reduce unnecessary load on work cache
Reversed equals() check to prevent NPE if current value is null.

timeline.bodyText: I'm slightly worried about using the 0 index here. Are we sure, this is always going to be 0?
timeline.author: slaskawi

replies.bodyText:
.get(0) - that is how setIfNotEmpty() was already implemented.
We also have checks - values != null && !values.isEmpty() that guarantee that collection is not empty.
Secondly, "get(0)" element is guaranteed to be non-null because "values" come from findAttributeValuesInContext() method which has ".filter(Objects::nonNull)"
replies.author: ovshevchuk
